patient.context: The patient was brought into the operating room suite, anesthesia administered via endotracheal tube.

anesthesia.context: The patient was brought into the operating room suite, anesthesia administered via endotracheal tube.

endotracheal tube.context: The patient was brought into the operating room suite, anesthesia administered via endotracheal tube.

Crowe-Davis mouth gag.context: The Crowe-Davis mouth gag was inserted in the oral cavity.

palate.context: The palate and tonsils were inspected, the palate was suspended with a red rubber catheter passed through the right nostril.

tonsils.context: The palate and tonsils were inspected, the palate was suspended with a red rubber catheter passed through the right nostril.

red rubber catheter.context: the palate was suspended with a red rubber catheter passed through the right nostril.

adenoid pad.context: The mirror was used to visualize the adenoid pad and an adenoid curet was seated against the vomer.

adenoid curet.context: The mirror was used to visualize the adenoid pad and an adenoid curet was seated against the vomer.

vomer.context: The mirror was used to visualize the adenoid pad and an adenoid curet was seated against the vomer.

nasopharynx.context: The nasopharynx was packed. Following this, the nasopharynx was unpacked, several discrete bleeding sites were gently coagulated with electrocautery and the nasopharynx and oral cavity were irrigated.

bleeding sites.context: several discrete bleeding sites were gently coagulated with electrocautery and the nasopharynx and oral cavity were irrigated.

electrocautery.context: several discrete bleeding sites were gently coagulated with electrocautery and the nasopharynx and oral cavity were irrigated.

irrigated.context: several discrete bleeding sites were gently coagulated with electrocautery and the nasopharynx and oral cavity were irrigated.

stable condition.context: The patient tolerated the procedure without difficulty and was in stable condition on transfer to recovery.
